Ashraf Garda bụ onye mgbasa ozi na South Afrika

Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe ngosi redio na SAfm ma na-akwado ihe ngosi "Media@SAfm", yana "Afternoon Talk" nke SAfm wee bụrụ onye na-akwado mmemme nyocha nke South African Broadcasting Corporation "Special Assignment" na Eprel 2011.
N'oge 2010 World Cup Ashraf nyere nyocha na egwuregwu yana nyocha mmetụta mmekọrịta nke World Cup na CNN, Al Jazeera, CBC Canada na SABC 2's Morning Live.
A mụrụ ya na Johannesburg, South Africa na 4 June 1962
Ashraf na ndị mụrụ ya biri na Fietas ruo mgbe ha kwagara Lenasia n'ihi Group Areas Act nke ọchịchị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ South Afrika
Ọ lụrụ Jamela Cassim ma ha abụọ malitere azụmahịa na-ere akwa na Oriental Plaza, nke a na-akpọ "Fabric Fantasy"
Ntinye Ashraf na redio malitere mgbe ọ kwadoro ihe ngosi egwuregwu na ụlọ ọrụ redio obodo "Radio az-Zaheer" na mgbe e mesịrị "Voice,95.4fm".
Ashraf rutere ọrụ akụkọ egwuregwu na ụlọ ọrụ redio South Africa a ma ama 5fm ma mesịa na SAfm
Garda ugbu a na-akwado ihe ngosi "Afternoon Talk" site na elekere nke abuo ruo elekere nke anọ nke ehihie kwa ụbọchị obụla ma na-eme ihe ngosi Media@SAfm kwa Sunday 9-11am.
Garda na-abụkarị onye ọbịa na-akwado "Interface", ihe ngosi ihe omume SABC na-eduga ugbu a ma bụrụ onye na-elekọta mmemme nyocha nyocha nke SABC "Special Assignment".
2007 South African Breweries Sports insert of the year (Safm)
2012 Turquoise Harmony Institute: Nkụzi Ubuntu na ihe nrite nke mkparịta ụka (ihe nrite mgbasa ozi)
